summary: Gives lockpicks a slight weight of 0.05
descriptionHtml:
Name: Lockpick Weight
Version: 1.0
Date: 2/8/2012
Category: Miscellaneous
Author(s): anandus
Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8263

Description
===========
Gives lockpicks a slight weight of 0.05


Install with Nexus Mod Manager
=======
Install and activate

Manual install:
=======
Unzip in the data-directory, check file in \'data files\' in the launcher.

Uninstall with Nexus Mod Manager
=======
Deactivate mod


Manual uninstall
=========
Remove lockpickweight.esp from data directory




History
=======
1.0, 2012/02/08 - Initial release

Contact
=======
You can find me on the official Elder Scrolls forums as \'anandus\'
You can find me on Nexus as \'anandus\'

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that 
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.
author: anandus
